author: absolutelylez
title: Horrible Shark
review: The pieces are useful, but to be honest, this model is painfully ugly, and hardly accurate. I think a small shark could have been made far better with different pieces, curves and better hinges. Of course this is only a promotional set so it would not be using more expensive pieces.

author: bod3
title: good shark, but could be improved!
review:
This set is good but could be better.

 

Pros: Nice tail,

Cool eyes,

good colours.

 

Cons: Should be more accurate,

Should have proper teeth pieces.

author: helpmeenglish
title: Cheepo predator
review:
With a price reaching little under 2 EUR, this is a great bargain for builders looking for a few extra blocks. I actually picked these up because of the old gray/ grey combo and because of the hinges. The set is not playable, yet from a few angles it actually looks good. I personally really befaned these plastic bag sets. Would recommend it to anyone who is looking for decently priced brickbank boosters. 


Cheers LEGO!
